core.data_classes module

The data classes used to support core components. We use dataclass which provides a decorator that automatically adds special methods to classes, such as __init__, __repr__, and __eq__, among others:

class core.data_classes.EmbedderResponse(data: List[core.data_classes.Embedding], model: str, usage: core.data_classes.Usage)[source]

Bases: object

data: List[Embedding]
model: str
usage: Usage
class core.data_classes.Embedding(embedding: List[float], index: int)[source]

Bases: object

In sync with api spec, same as openai/types/embedding.py

embedding: List[float]
index: int
class core.data_classes.ModelType(value)[source]

Bases: Enum

An enumeration.
